name: GDMS-Topology
body:
GDMS-Topology is a graph analysis plugin for [OrbisGIS](https://github.com/irstv/orbisgis) based on [JGraphT](https://github.com/jgrapht/jgrapht). It is intended for use on transportation networks.

As of now, GDMS-Topology supports the following SQL functions:
* [`ST_Graph`](https://github.com/agouge/gdms-topology/blob/master/src/main/java/org/gdms/gdmstopology/function/ST_Graph.java) - Constructs a mathematical graph based on the data contained in the input table.

The following features are under active development:
* Closeness centrality
* Betweenness centrality
tagline: A graph analysis plugin for OrbisGIS based on JGraphT
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
